last night i had a breathwork class and the energy of the class was unlike any i have felt. it carried the heaviness of the what’s happening in our country. so i asked my students to open up their hea. to imagine giving love to themselves as a child. and then imagine sending love to every single person on our planet. imagine sending out your love like dandelions. having them fall on anyone who feels alone. who is scared. who is speaking up. who is exhausted of fighting. who is huing. who feels lost. 💔💔💔
our world would look very different if we knew how to love ourselves. if we knew how to love each other. if we knew the impoance of healing ourselves. this weekend i have two classes that will help you sta on that journey. tomorrow saturday at 10am i will be hosting an intimate class in my home. and saturday at 5:30pm i will be teaching at unplug meditation in santa monica. dm for more details.  sending you lots of love and light!
💔💔💔
“each time a woman stands up for herself, she stands up for all women.” - maya angelou
📸

repost from @theemarissad today i got time.
••
rape culture affects every woman. most women and girls live in the fear of rape/sexual assault. men in general, don’t. this is the functionality of rape culture. the cycle of fear is the legacy of rape culture. ••
never ask or question when a woman decides to share her story. that’s none of your business. please understand the assault is engraved into her memory and triggers cause horrific reactions, anxiety & ongoing fear. an unlimited amount of tears will never release the deep felt pain. ••
men, talk to your male friends. check your men especially family members. raise your boys. & to my women: be strong, continue to heal and when you’re ready #speakup #metoo

text:
as promised, kevin gates has delivered his luca brasi 3 mixtape. released on friday (sept. 28), the 18-track project features the previously released tracks “money long,” “great man” and “me too,” which thankfully has nothing to do with the #metoo movement.

luca brasi 3 is gates’ first full-length project since the release of by any means 2 in september 2017. the mixtape also serves as a sequel to luca brasi 2, which was released way back in 2014.

gates has been hard at work since being released from jail in january. in may, the baton rouge, la. rapper dropped his chained to the city ep and teamed up with youngboy never broke again in august for three songs on the rapper’s 4 respect project.

ahead of the release of luca brasi 3, gates spoke with zane lowe of beats 1 and revealed it’s the first time he’s ever “truly been free.” “i always had a warrant or something pending,” he told lowe. “i mean, i’m not trying to sound like this nature lover or nothing like that, but when i was working out, i saw a bird that was so beautiful in my front yard, and i was like man, that bird beautiful. it was a beautiful thing to me, and i know before having this conversation with you, maybe years prior, i wouldn’t have been able to enjoy that because i always had something over my head lingering.” peep the tracklist and stream luca brasi 3 below.

kevin gates’ luca brasi 3 mixtape tracklist

1. “discussion”
2. “shakin back”
3. “ridiculous”
4. “money long”
5. “i got u”
6. “great man”
7. “find you again”
8. “adding up”
9. “in god i trust”
10. “me too”
11. “servin h”
12. “wrong love”
13. “luca brasi freestyle”
14. “shoulda”
15. “kung fu”
16. “don’t know”
17. “tryna yea”
18. “m.a.t.a.”

text:
women empowering women❤️
i’m far from a feminist and frankly my views favor a man in charge in most ways but personal safety, firearm knowledge and basic trauma medicine is everyones obligation.

text: i work at a public library, and while working yesterday, my coworkers and i checked the news reports fairly regularly, all reaching a point where we had to stop looking because it became too painful and too frustrating. most of the women i work with are decades older, and listening to them tell me that they fully support dr. ford because they too have been victims and—decades later—still haven’t been able to come forward about it added to the pain of it all. i’ve carried many of my pains for nearly two decades now, but these women i work with have carried many of theirs for five or six. and for goodness’ sake, in the midst of it all yesterday, one of these women was very inappropriately pursued by a male patron. and this is no rare occurrence. more and more i just want to be in the place in this photo, our home, with no one around. i will continue to fight, but goddamn if it isn’t hard, and heartbreaking, and even terrifying. just know that i’m here. i see you. i hear you. i believe you. 💛

text: breaking just within the past hour, as republicans continue their sham in the capital: @yalelawschool dean heather gerken joins the american bar association in calling for an investigation into brett kavanaugh and the credible charges brought against him. kavanaugh attended @yale for both undergraduate and graduate school and touted that fact yesterday at his hearing. hundreds of current and former #yale students, including classmates of kavanaugh, have come forward calling for an investigation to take place immediately and/or for kavanaugh to withdraw entirely. remember this as we advance into #midterms; even members of his own school community, which kavanaugh so proudly references whenever possible, are calling for an fbi investigation of brett kavanaugh. the outright refusal by both republicans and brett kavanaugh is a dereliction of justice and must be prosecuted by all of us with our blue votes at midterms ✌🏽💙💖🌊 (🎨: lanyc) #believesurvivors #trustwomen #believewomen #stopkavanaugh #girlpower #curatedbylanyc

text:
trigger warning.. i feel sick and i’m shaking at work as i type this out but if i don’t do it now, i don’t know if i ever will.
i was 12, he was 16.
i thought he loved me.
it happened 4 times because i thought he loved me.
i didn’t scream.
i didn’t fight back.
i said no several times and gave up out of fear and inertia.
he didn’t use a condom.
he told me we would keep in touch.
when i got home he told me he had a new girlfriend.
when i found him on facebook a couple years ago i messaged him to see if he remembered me and what he did.
“you’re dead to me.” was his response.
he has since been convicted for two other assaults/rape on minors.
i wil always blame myself for their suffering because i didn’t report him.
after almost 11 years i still have ptsd from it, recoiling from people i love because my mind makes me see him since or feel him instead.
my husband has also seen me suffer because of what happened; going into panic attacks during or after being intimate, and every time he will feel like he did something wrong when that is farthest from the truth but has helped me, picked me up every single time and has given me nothing less than unconditional love, support and understanding❤️
my name is taylor and i was raped when i was 12 by a 16 year old boy named kevin and i still suffer while he walks free, i will blame myself for letting him walk free but i will continue to remain strong and fight for those like me. 
i’m here if anyone needs someone to talk to, you’re not alone.
#whyididntreport #believesurvivors #metoo #metoomovement

when i got home he told me he had a new girlfriend.
when i found him on facebook a couple years ago i messaged him to see if he remembered me and what he did.
“you’re dead to me.” was his response.
he has since been convicted for two other assaults/rape on minors.
i wil always blame myself for their suffering because i didn’t repo him.
after almost 11 years i still have ptsd from it, recoiling from people i love because my mind makes me see him since or feel him instead.
my husband has also seen me suffer because of what happened; going into panic attacks during or after being intimate, and every time he will feel like he did something wrong when that is fahest from the truth but has helped me, picked me up every single time and has given me nothing less than unconditional love, suppo and understanding❤️
my name is taylor and i was raped when i was 12 by a 16 year old boy named kevin and i still suffer while he walks free, i will blame myself for letting him walk free but i will continue to remain strong and fight for those like me. 
i’m here if anyone needs someone to talk to, you’re not alone.

text:
🐯this happy picture of penguins with no care in the world was selected in an effort to lighten the triggers sparked by yesterday’s events.
.
🎓this is not meant to spark a political discussion, but as a women’s health provider who sees physical, emotional, and financial abuse on a daily basis, one cannot help but feel moved, triggered, and saddened by what dr. christine blasey ford had to say during her intimate, private and personal ptsd nightmare related to the actions of brett kavanaugh/another.
.
⚡️if it didn’t send chills down your spine- then consider yourself lucky. maybe you have never been on the side of just ten seconds that could change your life forever, but i have, and so have many of the women i encounter on a daily basis - whom i know laid in bed last night with nightmares in their brains mixed with feelings of hope deep in their hearts.
.
⚡️we know this abuse triggers nerves in your brain causing life long physical and mental health issues such as chronic abdominal and pelvic pain, ibs, fibromyalgia, anxiety/depression, cystitis, cycles of abuse and more. it’s chilling how many women never step forward or wait years, even decades before even confronting- or in some cases even remembering- these events (if at all).
.
💥all i can do is hope i can raise a strong female who will not be afraid to speak up, or tell her mom if she was inappropriately touched, and a son who respects women and never allows himself to be in a room without the door open with her. drastic? no- not today.
.
⭐️for those that were triggered- i’m right there with you. all we can do is take these events positively to continue to push for change in our children’s future, and to seek professional counseling if the ptsd is causing deep depression or thoughts of harming yourself.
.
☀️to all my strong women-> you are not alone.
#mentalhealth #metoo #talkaboutit #strongertogether #doctormom #doctorlife #womenshealth #speakup #ptsdawareness
name: HEATHER HIRSCH | WOMENS HEALTH
